/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a moment on a bustling highway in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The highway itself is divided by a concrete barrier, providing a sense of order and safety. On the right side of the highway, there's a green fence running parallel to the road, adding a touch of color to the otherwise gray concrete barrier. 

On the left side of the highway, a tall white tower stands out against the blue sky. It's adorned with multiple antennas and dishes, hinting at its function as a telecommunications tower. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day.

In the distance, a few cars can be seen driving on the highway, their colors muted against the gray asphalt. On the right side of the highway, there's a green sign with white text, although the exact words are not discernible from this distance. The overall scene is a typical day on a busy highway in a city, with vehicles going about their journeys under the watchful eye of the telecommunications tower.
